short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings back the HUH emote by replacing any WOT or BrainSlug emote with HUH

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the WOT and BrainSlug emotes in the twitch chat of your favorite streamers with the HUH emote.
